Author: Moderator
Message: Welcome Rex.

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you can see this, please say "yes"

Author: Rex
Message: Yes

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Rex
Message: yes

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Rex
Message: Yes

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Rex
Message: Hi there

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Rex
Message: I'm doing well. How are you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing quite alright thanks. What are you up to?

Author: Rex
Message: Not much. Just enjoying a quiet Saturday

Author: Andrew
Message: Sounds quite good. That's pretty much the same for me actually.

Author: Rex
Message: It's nice to enjoy some peace and quiet every now and then, isn't it?

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah. Without the stress of having to work on something or running everywhere. Simply enjoying yourself watching TV or playing games.

Author: Rex
Message: Indeed. It's my favorite way to spend my time off

Author: Andrew
Message: Do you like video games?

Author: Rex
Message: I do, actually. They're my favorite pastime

Author: Andrew
Message: Which ones in particular? Or what kind of games?

Author: Rex
Message: I enjoy most genres. I've recently started playing Halo again

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh yeah I played the first three ones a while ago in co-op.

Author: Rex
Message: That's cool. Which one is your favorite?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm not entirely sure. I'd say the third one, but I never got to finish it.

Author: Rex
Message: Have you played any of the newer ones?

Author: Andrew
Message: Unfortunately no. I don't have a Xbox One.

Author: Rex
Message: Neither do I

Author: Andrew
Message: I've watched a playthrough of the fourth on youtube though.

Author: Rex
Message: I didn't enjoy the fourth one very much. I haven't played the fifth, so I wouldn't know much about it

Author: Andrew
Message: What is it you didn't like in the fourth?

Author: Rex
Message: The plot seemed pointless and the gameplay felt too generic. Overall just not very memorable

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to (This is not your final answer)

Author: Rex
Message: The A.I.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll start the next conversation. Andrew will begin and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Rex
Message: Yes

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Rex
Message: Hello there

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Rex
Message: I'm doing well, and you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing quite alright. What are you up to?

Author: Rex
Message: Just sitting around, enjoying my afternoon

Author: Andrew
Message: Anything fun planned?

Author: Rex
Message: Other than sleeping in, not really

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, that's not bad. I could definitely use that.

Author: Rex
Message: I'm sure. Are you up to anything interesting?

Author: Andrew
Message: Probably just going to play games actually. Do you play Minecraft?

Author: Rex
Message: I used to, but not so much anymore

Author: Andrew
Message: Why not?

Author: Rex
Message: I felt that it got repetitive quickly. Ran out of things to do

Author: Andrew
Message: Ah yeah that tends to happen unfortunately.

Author: Rex
Message: Are there any other games you enjoy?

Author: Andrew
Message: I only really play Minecraft, but lately I've also been very much into Mass Effect.

Author: Rex
Message: Have you played the newest one?

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah I have actually.

Author: Rex
Message: Did you enjoy it? I've heard good and bad things about it

Author: Andrew
Message: I did yes. But it still deserves its reputation. It does have good and bad things.

Author: Rex
Message: What did you enjoy most about it?

Author: Andrew
Message: That's a good question actually. I'm not entirely sure.

Author: Rex
Message: What system do you play it on?

Author: Andrew
Message: PC. That's where I play most of my games now.

Author: Rex
Message: I've been wanting to get a new PC, but I don't quite have the funds at the moment

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah they can be quite expensive. I think it's a really good idea if you want to enjoy plenty of nice games though. You don't need to get one that expensive to play the latest games on it.

Author: Rex
Message: Yeah, but I'd like one that can handle pretty much any game and still have them look great. Also, one that will last a while

Author: Andrew
Message: Get a desktop computer then.
